title: Create Variables
text: We are looking to find the measure of two angles. Let $$x=measure$$ of larger angle and $$y=measure$$ of smaller angle.

title: Translate to a System of Equations
text: The two angles are supplementary, translating into $$x+y=180$$. The larger angle is 12 degrees more than three times the smaller angle, translating into $$x=3y+12$$.

title: Solve the System
text: Using substitution we can substitute $$x=3y+12$$ into $$x+y=180$$ to solve for y, the smaller angle. \\n $$x+y=180$$ \\n $$3y+12+y=180$$ \\n $$4y+12=180$$ \\n $$4y=168$$
